definition: Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
grandson/descendant
surname Sun
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你给我指出哪一个县实施了孙中山先生的三民主义？

sentences.english: The paper presents a set of observations on political theology of Sun Yat-sen's thought.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对孙中山思想中的政治神学所做的一些观察。

sentences.english: In 1906 he met Mr. Sun Yat-sen in Japan and joined the Chinese Revolutionary League.
sentences.chinese: 1906年他在日本得会孙中山，并加入同盟会。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat- sen came Chiang Kai- shek, who brought the Kuomintang' s military power to its zenith.
sentences.chinese: 蒋介石代替孙中山，创造了国民党的全盛的军事时代。

sentences.english: This movie is a retrospect on the life of Sun Yat-sen.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影回顾了孙中山先生的一生。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat-sen visited back and Yuet Chau.
sentences.chinese: 孙中山视察过后，回到和悦洲。

sentences.english: I know Confucius and Dr.SunYatsen are the representatives .
sentences.chinese: 我知道孔子和孙中山的思想。

sentences.english: The equality in land properties was one of the important content of Dr.
sentences.chinese: “平均地权”是孙中山“民生主义”的内容之一。

sentences.english: Zhang plays Sun Yat-Sen in the movie "Bodyguards and Assassins".
sentences.chinese: 张涵予在电影《十月围城》中扮演孙中山。

sentences.english: You can visit the Dr Sun Yatsen Memorial Hall in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 你可以参观广州孙中山博士纪念堂。

sentences.english: Sun Yat-sen advocated governing the country by political parties' during the period of political tutelage.
sentences.chinese: 孙中山主张在训政时期实行“以党治国”。

sentences.english: "Dai-Jitaoism" came out presently after SUN Ya-sen passed away.
sentences.chinese: 孙中山去世后不久，“戴季陶主义”就问世了。

sentences.english: Thought of "Separation of Three Powers" is important contents of Sun Yat-sen's Principle of Democracy.
sentences.chinese: 五权分立思想是孙中山民权主义的重要内容。

sentences.english: In front of the Hall stands a bronze statue of Dr Sun Yat-sen.
sentences.chinese: 在纪念堂前竖立着孙中山先生的铜像。

sentences.english: The bridge is named Yet-sun Bridge after Dr. Sun Yet-sun.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥以孙中山先生的名字而得名，叫逸仙桥。

sentences.english: His first stop is Nanjing where the late Sun Yat-sen's tomb is located.
sentences.chinese: 吴伯雄首站抵达南京，这里是孙中山先生陵寝所在地。

definition: Yuan Shikai (1859-1916), senior general of late Qing, subsequently warlord and self-proclaimed emperor of China
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
Wang Ching-wei (1883-1944), left-wing Guomingdang politician, subsequently Japanese collaborator
Song Jiaoren (1882-1913), politician of the revolutionary party involved in the 1911 Xinhai revolution, murdered in Shanghai in 1913
the Warlord government of Northern China that developed from the Qing Beiyang army 北洋軍閥|北洋军阀 after the Xinhai revolution of 1911
Tang Shaoyi (1862-1939), politician and diplomat
Cai E (1882-1916), originator of the National protection army of 1915
Duan Qirui (1864-1936), commander of Beiyang Army under Yuan Shikai, then politician and powerful warlord
Song Qingling or Rosemonde Soong (1893-1981), wife of Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
Chiang Kai-shek (1887-1975), military leader, head of the Nationalist government in China 1928-1949 and the government in exile on Taiwan 1950-1975
opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 in War of national protection 1915-1916/same as 反袁鬥爭|反袁斗争
Xu Shichang (1855-1939), politician associated with the Northern Warlords, president of China in 1921
Tongmenghui, Sun Yat-sen's alliance for democracy, founded 1905, became the Guomindang 國民黨|国民党 in 1912
Xinhai Revolution (1911), which ended the Qing Dynasty
Feng Yuxiang (1882-1948), warlord during Republic of China, strongly critical of Chiang Kai-shek
the original name of 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1], Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3]
